email_text:
Dear PayPal Customer,

We have detected some unusual activity on your PayPal account and for security reasons, we need you to verify your account information. This is to ensure that your account is not being used fraudulently.

Please click on the link below to verify your account:
[Phishing link]

If you do not verify your account within the next 24 hours, we will have no choice but to suspend your account temporarily.

Thank you for your cooperation in helping us keep your account safe and secure.

Sincerely,
PayPal Security Team
